question: Lucas picks 147 bananas on Sunday. Then he picks 79 bananas on Monday. On Tuesday, he picks six times the number of bananas he did on Sunday. How many bananas does Lucas have?
answer:
Combining Sunday and Monday, Lucas has 147 bananas + 79 bananas = <<147+79=226>>226 bananas.
On Tuesday, he picks 6*147 bananas = <<6*147=882>>882 bananas.
Altogether, Lucas has 226 bananas + 882 bananas = <<226+882=1108>>1108 bananas.
#### 1108
